titleInfo.title: 'Panoramic View of Hills, Elphinstone Inlet. [Persian Gulf]' Photographer: Unknown

physicalDescription.extent: Dimensions:142 x 204 mmCondition:The print is in good condition, though the mounting paper is heavily foxed and crumblingFoliation:‘11’Process:Silver gelatin

mods.abstract: Genre/Subject Matter:View from on board ship, looking towards Elphinstone Inlet [Muḩāfaz̧at Musandam], off Telegraph Island.A steamer is visible right of centre and a smaller craft can be seen at far left. Rocky hills fill the skyline and a small low-lying island is visible in front of them.Inscriptions:Ink, below image: 'Panoramic View of Hills, Elphinstone Inlet.’
